alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 30 at 3:50AM CDT until June 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Henderson, Lee and Des Moines Counties. ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. For the Mississippi River...including Gladstone LD18, Burlington... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
